MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: PM> Install-Package Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql –Pre PM> Install-Package Microsoft.Azure.Management.Resources –Pre PM> Install-Package Microsoft.Azure.Common.Authentication –Pre
